name: mldock
description: NodeJS/TypeScript library/CLI -- downloads MarkLogic rpms and builds docker images hosting MarkLogic Server 8+
author: Daphne Maddox <laurelnaiad@gmail.com>

scripts-info.cleanup: rm -rf the build, and dist and coverage directories
scripts-info.dist: build src to dist directory, bringing relevant portions of package.json for npm publishing
scripts-info.test: run tests and report code coverage into the covarege directory

scripts.test: npm-run-all clean_cover clean_build build && node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha build/test/index.unit.js
scripts.build: tsc -p . && shx mkdir -p build/src/dockerFiles && shx cp -R src/dockerFiles/* build/src/dockerFiles/
scripts.dist: tsc -p src && shx mkdir -p dist/dockerFiles && shx cp -R src/dockerFiles/* dist/dockerFiles/ && node scripts/makePackage.js
scripts.prepare_dev: npm version prerelease && npm pack dist
scripts.prepare_publish: npm version patch && npm pack dist
